name: Epi Support
descr: The elbow joint consists of three individual joints formed by the humerus, the ulna and the radius. In most cases, elbow joint problems are due to overuse. The most common reason for chronic pain in the elbow joint is "tennis elbow". This is caused by overuse of the extensors originating on the outer side of the elbow. Pressure pad offers gentle, targeted pressure to help relieve pain. Velcro fastener for adjustable fit. Simple to apply thanks to practical one-hand fastening system. The Chiroform Tennis Elbow Support helps reduce pain and prevent injuries. Recommended for all activities that put severe strain on the elbow, e.g. aerobics, squash, tennis etc.
